description: The short version of Vuori' sOptimist Pant, these have all the same details that make it great: our two-way stretch cotton corduroy reinvented for performance and comfort, side seam and back welt pockets, plus our signature drawcord for all-day comfort. A modern twist on an ‘70s classic, now in a fit perfect for warmer days.
name: Vuori Optimist Shorts - Mens
